```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(text):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, text)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*in\sthe\s*real\s*world"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, text)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, text)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*that\scan\s*store\s*data\s*messages"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, text)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"the\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*mission"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, text)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*data"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, text)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) hardware"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) object"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) to ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) and ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

import re

    entities = {
        'Software System': [],

```python
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|[A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|[A-Z][a-z]+)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|[A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|[A-Z][a-z]+)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+|to [A-Z][a-z]+|for [A-Z][a-z]+|of [A-Z][a-z]+|in [A-Z][a-z]+|with [A-Z][a-z]+|that [A-Z][a-z]+|as [A-Z][a-z]+|on [A-Z][a-z]+|at [A-Z][a-z]+|by [A-Z][a-z]+|from [A-Z][a-z]+|to [A-Z][a-z]+|of [A-Z][a-z]+|in [A-Z][a-z]+|with [A-Z][a-z]+|that [A-Z][a-z]+|as [A-Z][a-z]+|on [A-Z][a-z]+|at [A-Z][a-z]+|by [A-Z][a-z]+|from [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|[A-Z][a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\bthe [a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Center-to-Center|DigitalHome|Correlator Monitor and Control System|EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = [system for system in software_systems]
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(virtual|patient|sun|old|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(virtual instrument data items|patient|sun|old|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects]
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(requirement|aim|purpose|description|definition|rationale|traceability|identification|qualification|procedures|determination|rational|description|definition|rationale|traceability|identification|qualification|procedures|determination)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(detail|information|description|definition|rationale|traceability|identification|qualification|procedures|determination|rational|description|definition|rationale|traceability|identification|qualification|procedures|determination)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena]
    
    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

    entities = {

        'Environment Object': [],

        'System Requirements': [],

    }

```python
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in software_system_matches]
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(device|tap|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card|patient|sun|old)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old|data items)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|patient|sun|old)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(requirements|description|determination|qualification|rationale|traceability|identification|definitions|specification|functional area|information|presentation|recommendations|guiding principle|architecture|interfaces|version|functionalities|requirements)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(detailed|description|information|data items|events|states|values|shared|phenomena)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
```

```python
    entities = {
```

```python
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(software|system)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(device|computer|interface|monitor|control|processor|interface|system)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(person|user|student|teacher|student|teacher|operator|system|interface|device|equipment|hardware|software|system|interface|device|equipment|hardware|software)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ hardware)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ student|Bobby|fractions)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ software|computer communication)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(a high resolution computer generated graphical user interface|IDFS data processing algorithms|interoperable with Predator and Outrider UAVs across the 5 levels of UAV interaction)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(mode operations|activities|a minimum of additional training)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\scontrol\sdevice\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\soperator\b', sentence)
    environment_objects += re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\soperator\b', sentence)
    environment_objects += re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\soperator\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sinterface\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("Bobby particularly likes to play systems where Bobby can excel."))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ server)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(shall|should|must|will provide|will have|will be able to|can|is able to|has the capability to) ([a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(2))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities
```

```python
import re
from typing import Dict, List

def extract_entities(sentence: str) -> Dict[str, List[str]]:
    """
    Extract entities from a sentence based on the given schema definition.

    Args:
    sentence (str): The input sentence from a software requirements specification.

    Returns:
    Dict[str, List[str]]: A dictionary with entity types as keys and lists of extracted entities as values.
    """
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+-\d+\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bcomputer\b|\bdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bpatient\b|\bsun\b|\buser\b',
        'External System': r'\bdatabase\b|\bmagnetic stripe card\b|\btap\b|\bhard disk\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\baim\b|\bpurpose\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\bDATEX/ASN runtime library\b|\bmessage sets\b|\bdata elements\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema definition
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    return result

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The umbrella will be a singular component, providing links to projects relating to fractions, decimals, and percents in a format accessible over the World Wide Web."))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*-\s*\w+\s*\w*|The\s*\w+\s*\w*|A\s*\w+\s*\w*)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*-\s*\w+\s*\w*|a\s*\w+\s*\w*|an\s*\w+\s*\w*|the\s*\w+\s*\w*)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*-\s*\w+\s*\w*|the\s*\w+\s*\w*)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*-\s*\w+\s*\w*|a\s*\w+\s*\w*|an\s*\w+\s*\w*|the\s*\w+\s*\w*)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'to\s*(\w+\s*\w*-\s*\w+\s*\w*|make\s*\w+\s*\w*|have\s*\w+\s*\w*)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*-\s*\w+\s*\w*|a\s*\w+\s*\w*|an\s*\w+\s*\w*|the\s*\w+\s*\w*)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ object\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ requirements\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ phenomena\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ data)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) server|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) database|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) card|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) disk'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match for match in external_system_matches if match]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) to be|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) must|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) should|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) will|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) can'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match for match in system_requirements_matches if match]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) information|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) data|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) results|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) parameters|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) plans|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) requests|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) status|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) updates|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) messages|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) events|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) states|([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) values'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match for match in shared_phenomena_matches if match]

    return entities
```

```python
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([a-z]+ [a-z]+ computer|any Internet-accessible computer|home computer|home devices|computers|a home computer)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(a user|the user|the patient|the sun|the old|a public network)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(an individual home web server|a DigitalHome home web server|a local home server|the DigitalHome web server|the home web server|ESRI's ARC Internet Map Server \(ARC IMS\) product|the C-2-C software system|a home database|a database|a magnetic stripe card|a tap|hard disk)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(establish and maintain DigitalHome User Accounts|run on multiple browsers|monitor and control home devices and systems|provide storage|provide backup service|access to all messaging,|monitor, and control traffic|maintenance and monitoring through remote logins|execute on a public network \(e.g., Internet\) and transmit equipment requests to the C-2-C software system|create of map images|run on any Internet-accessible computer with a web browser that supports)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(a map|equipment requests|user account information|user plans|DigitalHome plans and data|a personal web server|a personal web page)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(GUI|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(splash|screen|user|device|page|style|frames|information|media|operator|user|system|correlator|monitor|control)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(user|screen|page|information|media|operator|system|correlator|monitor|control|incident|closure|lane|content|counterpart|individuals|EVLA|Correlator|Monitor|Control|System|introduction)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(database|card|tap|disk|EVLA|Correlator|Monitor|Control|System|media)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(shall|should|may|can|will)\s+(be|have|allow|provide|send|remove|override|copy|read|understand|match|turn|off|on|be|have|allow|provide|send|remove|override|copy|read|understand|match|turn|off|on)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = []

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(splash|screen|page|style|frames|information|media|operator|user|system|correlator|monitor|control|incident|closure|lane|content|counterpart|individuals|EVLA|Correlator|Monitor|Control|System|introduction|option|skip|remove|override|copy|read|understand|match|turn|off|on|be|have|allow|provide|send|remove|override|copy|read|understand|match|turn|off|on|alerts|time|stamps|parameters|necessary|desired|chosen|taken|action|alert|email|SMS)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdevice\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Tactical|tactical)\s+(Control|control)\s+(System|system)\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('The Tactical Control System')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(UAV|uav)\b'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append('UAV')

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|The)\s+(user|User)\b|\b(a|an|An)\s+(friendly|friendly)\s+(robotic|robotic)\s+(sidekick|sidekick)\b|\b(operator|Operator)\b'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append('the user')
        entities['Environment Object'].append('a friendly robotic sidekick')
        entities['Environment Object'].append('the operator')

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(graphical|Graphical)\s+(user|User)\s+(interface|Interface)\b'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append('a user interface')

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(track|Track)\s+(the|The)\s+(submitted|submitted)\s+(defect|defect)\s+or\s+(enhancement|enhancement)\s+(request|request)\b'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append('track the submitted defect or enhancement request')

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(error|Error)\s+(message|Message)\b'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('error message')

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[0].strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[0].strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1].strip())

    return entities
```

    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System|CCTNS|Center-to-Center|CMIB|the user interface|the system)\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(2))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(high resolution computer|mouse)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(Bobby|Alice|the administrator|a new user|UAV operator|UAVs|UAV payloads|operator|the patient|the sun|the old)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(graphical user interface|database|database indexes|the user interface|CMIB operating system)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(facilitates the investigation process and introduces operational efficiencies|change the configuration|log any defects|enhancement requests|track thereafter|create and add a new user)\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(initial entries|the competition he requires|a unique experience the next time through the program|make the user interface more accessible)\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*have\s*the\s*ability\s*to\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*able\s*to\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*have\s*the\s*ability\s*to\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*able\s*to\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'the\s*ability\s*to\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*have\s*the\s*ability\s*to\s*(\w+\s*\w*)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(text):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system|the [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system|the [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, text)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, text)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+|an [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, text)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(a|an|the) (device|switch|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card|computer|phone|network|interface|system|terminal|controller|sensor|actuator)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(a|an|the) (user|patient|sun|old|incident|lane|closure|center|operator|data|terminal|image|graphic|comment|player|game|interface)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(a|an|the) (database|website|system|network|interface|terminal|controller|sensor|actuator|home|device)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(add|change|override|select|input|output|prompt|provide|issue|manually|automatically)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(information|data|currency|units|measurement|temperature|date|time|phone|number|address|postal|code|format|value|parameter|mode|function|selection|content|overlay|image|graphic|comment)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {

```python
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(CCTNS|game|DigitalHome|user interface|Virtual Correlator Interface|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(input|controllers|player|employee|citizen|user|lane closure)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user|player|employee|citizen|lane closure|game|DigitalHome|user interface|Virtual Correlator Interface|system|individual|user group|operator|center|dynamic lane)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user interface|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|CCTNS|game|DigitalHome|Virtual Correlator Interface|system)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(to allow|making|monitoring|recommending|providing|customizing|utilized|altering|inputting)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(velocity adjustment|information|content|navigation|graphics|comments|annotation|target dynamic lane and plan|configuration parameters|gameplay moments)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) is a critical component in the ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) path'
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Software System'].append(match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device allows a user to make a manual temperature setting'
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) is an entity in the real world'
    match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall be provided to ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['External System'].append(match.group(2))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall be calibrated and validated prior to depositing in the ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) data shall be calibrated and validated prior to depositing in the ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group(1))

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The output of this process is the adjusted velocity of the spaceship, represented as a decimal value."))
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ user\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ database\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ values\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(text):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', text)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', text)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', text)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', text)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', text)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', text)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

## Code
```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+System"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+(.*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+data"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The system continuously listens for a mouse click event during the playback."))
```

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s*(\w+)-to-(\w+)\s*system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(\w+)-to-(\w+)\s*device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|[A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(power switch device|downlinked video)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(the user|the movie|the game|players|a splash screen|a specific unit of content)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(workstation software|Each page|downlinked video)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(viewing|modification|deletion|provides aircraft flight data or payload data in the foreground|is easy to recognize|help in navigating|to support different navigation strategies)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(a CCTV switching command|Source|Destination port|a display windows|displaying a video window overlaid on a map screen|a map screen overlaid on a video screen|Alternative access paths|the state|style sheets and/or frames|an equivalent alternative text-only page|mission plan|mission plan|a link|a landmark page|a clear and sufficient indication|the subsequent output|the transition to the game\'s main menu|their adventure)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("If the movie is skipped or once it concludes, the subsequent output is the transition to the game's main menu, where players can start their adventure or access various game settings."))
```

*   `software_system_pattern`: Matches strings that start with a capital letter and contain one or more words, or strings that start with a capital letter and contain only one word.
*   `physical_device_pattern`: Matches the strings "power switch device" and "downlinked video".
*   `environment_object_pattern`: Matches the strings "the user", "the movie", "the game", "players", "a splash screen", and "a specific unit of content".
*   `external_system_pattern`: Matches the strings "workstation software", "Each page", and "downlinked video".
*   `system_requirements_pattern`: Matches the strings "viewing", "modification", "deletion", "provides aircraft flight data or payload data in the foreground", "is easy to recognize", "help in navigating", and "to support different navigation strategies".
*   `shared_phenomena_pattern`: Matches the strings "a CCTV switching command", "Source", "Destination port", "a display windows", "displaying a video window overlaid on a map screen", "a map screen overlaid on a video screen", "Alternative access paths", "the state", "style sheets and/or frames", "an equivalent alternative text-only page", "mission plan", "mission plan", "a link", "a landmark page", "a clear and sufficient indication", "the subsequent output", "the transition to the game's main menu", and "their adventure".

The function uses the `re.findall` method to find all matches of the regular expressions in the input sentence. The matches are then added to the corresponding list in the `entities` dictionary.

Finally, the function returns a JSON string containing the `entities` dictionary.

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) object'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [f'{match[0]} {match[1]}' for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) and ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [f'{match[0]} and {match[1]}' for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

```python
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([a-z]+ to [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}(?:mouse|keyboard|trackball|power|switch|device|terminal|display|video|printer|card|disk|tap|stripe|card|system)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}(?:operator|user|patient|sun|old|ear)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}(?:database|card|disk|tap|stripe|system)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}(?:requirement|aim|purpose|function|selection|override|mode|operation|startup|termination)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}(?:event|state|value|message|alert|tone|output|input|configuration|control|queue|parameter|communication|setting|mode)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+ system|the system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(household devices|switches|tap|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card|a device|a device in the real world)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object

    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(the DigitalHome website|a database|a magnetic stripe card|a tap|hard disk)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(add a user account|change the default parameter settings|override planned parameter values|log any defects|enhancement requests|track thereafter|edit a users system access properties|manually override the automatic mode selection|manually override the automatic function selection|change the configuration)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(actions|actions|alerts|the game sequence|redirecting the player|Source|Destination port|Target DMS|Message to be displayed|Beacons On/Off|User name|Password|the manner in which|the particular startup mode)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
``` 
```python
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\bdevice\b|\binput\b|\boutput\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\buser\b|\busers\b|\bpatient\b|\bthe\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\bsite\b|\bcard\b|\bhard disk\b|\bdatabase\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\brequirement\b|\baim\b|\bpurpose\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\bshared\b|\bstate\b|\bvalue\b|\bevent\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(Center|HCI|DMS|HOV|HAR|CCTV|user interface)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(input|network|HAR|DMS|HOV|CCTV|e-mail|chat|window|list|search results|beacons|port|camera|display|device|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(users|employees|citizens|patient|sun|old|user|operator|players|mobile users|users with disabilities)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|user interface|presentation segment|window|page|chat function|e-mail window|search results|list|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(make|provide|support|monitor|adapt|recommend|inference|individualization|user adaptation|access|navigation|efficiency|understanding|information|content|structure|position|tasks|needs|tasks and needs|relevant information|access to relevant information|making access to relevant information more efficient|making the content easy to understand|prompt|valid input|switching|display|beacons on/off|message|display message|switching command|source|destination|port|input|output|camera|display|beacon|beacons)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(questions|information|tasks|needs|structure|position|content|image|graphics|annotation|comments|behaviour|goals|relevance|interest|navigation|access|path|segment|window|page|list|search results|results|input|output|input mode|message|display message|switching command|source|destination|port|input|output|camera|display|beacon|beacons|network identifier|HAR identifier|username|password|message|device control command|target|plan|beacons on/off|message to be displayed|target HAR|text to be sent to the HAR|target HOV|plan|clear and sufficient indication|appropriate terminology|action types|manipulating|searching|communication|opening|starting|sorting|list of search results|beacons on/off|source|destination|port|camera|display|beacon|beacons)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match)

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("Players interact with this component by responding to the displayed questions."))
``` 

```python
    entities = {

        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    software_system_pattern = r'\b[a-zA-Z]+ Center\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-zA-Z]+ device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-zA-Z]+ user\b|\b[a-zA-Z]+ group\b|\b[a-zA-Z]+s\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[a-zA-Z]+ interface\b|\b[a-zA-Z]+ database\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[a-zA-Z]+ goal\b|\b[a-zA-Z]+ need\b|\b[a-zA-Z]+ requirement\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-zA-Z]+ option\b|\b[a-zA-Z]+ choice\b|\b[a-zA-Z]+ question\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The )?(CCTNS|DigitalHome|Correlator Monitor and Control System|user interface|application|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] if match[1] else match[0] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(device|computer|phone|tablet|smartphone|laptop|server|machine|equipment|hardware|system)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(user|users|individual users|user groups|police|patient|sun|old|general user|end-user|all user|all user interfaces)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|web interface|browser interface|Software tools|User Access and Authentication Service)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(easy to use and intuitive throughout|easy|making access to relevant information more efficient|to provide a familiar and common look|detailed context-sensitive|perform simple web operations|to ensure Single-Sign|straightforward and accessible approach)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(appropriate terminology|information|fractions|user interface rules|context-sensitive help material|system wide configuration|a low level CMIB command line instruction|logging in and logging out|browsing web pages|submitting information and requests|Single-Sign on|a common User Access|Authentication Service)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```
