import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(to [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ hardware\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sdevice\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([a-z]+ to [a-z]+ and [a-z]+ throughout)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))
    else:
        system_requirements_pattern = r'([a-z]+ to [a-z]+)'
        system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
        if system_requirements_match:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ operations|activities)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(system|software)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(a|an)\s+(device)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_devices]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(map|patient|sun|old|incident|GUI|database|DMS|Center-to-Center|player|score|narrative|conclusion)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_objects]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(a|an)\s+(database|VCR|GUI|data link|RS-170A video interface)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_systems]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(shall|will)\s+(be|display|present|output|input|record|playback|permit|combine|tailored|display|provide|include|contain|get|send|receive|store|route|display|format|store|route|display)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(error|status|data|activities|mode|operations|formatting|storing|routing|display|annotation|comments|graphics|AV status values|last values were reported|frames|overlays|recording|playback|output and input analog imagery|data)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena]

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The primary outputs of the ending scene include the display of the player's total score accumulated throughout the system and a tailored narrative conclusion."))

    entities['External System'] = external_systems

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) object'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) requirements'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) phenomena'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(system|software)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(device)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old|user|users|user groups|individual users|building blocks)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|user interface|existing systems)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(make|provide|enable|allow|give|give the user|give the ability to)\s+(access|use|utilize|be utilized|track|log|execute|report|customize|modify|resize|move)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[2] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(content|information|data|results|interface|configuration parameters|queries|temperature|date and time|phone numbers|address|postal codes|terminology|technologies|interface|data|information|results|interface|configuration parameters|queries|temperature|date and time|phone numbers|address|postal codes|terminology|technologies)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("This design allows for the efficient input of new data or modifications to existing questions."))

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Remote|GUI|System|Interface|Tool)\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [f"{item[1]} {item[0]}" for item in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(a|an)\s+(button|device|page|window)\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [f"{item[1]} {item[0]}" for item in physical_devices]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user|help-desk user|police|home page|landmark page|page|window|list|GUI)\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [f"{item[1]} {item[0]}" for item in environment_objects]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(a|an)\s+(button|tool|system|database|card|disk|GUI)\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [f"{item[1]} {item[0]}" for item in external_systems]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(smooth|organized|easy|efficient|fast|clear|concise|sufficient|frequent|important|different|monthly|RTI related)\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(question|navigation|content|update|process|report|query|entry|task|status|request|defect|enhancement|page|window|list|GUI|button|tool|system|database|card|disk)\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) video'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) request'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) levels'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'to (.*?)(?:and|or)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) data'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("This file contains the updated question data, structured in a format that the system sequence can dynamically read and incorporate into the gameplay."))

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence.lower())

    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Identify the entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        if token in ['system', 'software']:
            schema['Software System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['device', 'hardware']:
            schema['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif token in ['object', 'environment']:
            schema['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif token in ['system', 'database', 'network']:
            schema['External System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['requirement', 'need']:
            schema['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif token in ['phenomena', 'event']:
            schema['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    # Map the entities to the schema
    schema['Software System'] = [token for token in tokens if token in ['system', 'software']]
    schema['Physical Device'] = [token for token in tokens if token in ['device', 'hardware']]
    schema['Environment Object'] = [token for token in tokens if token in ['object', 'environment']]
    schema['External System'] = [token for token in tokens if token in ['system', 'database', 'network']]
    schema['System Requirements'] = [token for token in tokens if token in ['requirement', 'need']]
    schema['Shared Phenomena'] = [token for token in tokens if token in ['phenomena', 'event']]

    # Return the entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(schema)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(GUI|Math Umbrella component|Tactical Control System|CCTNS system|DigitalHome|EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(AV)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user|patient|sun|old|splash screen|incident|lane closure|administrator|Center|users|Administrators)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(log any defects|enhancement requests|track thereafter|exception handling|clear, descriptive message|navigation option|recovery startup mode|unplanned power interruption|abnormal program termination|recovery startup mode|downlink|payload center field of view|footprint|interface|frequently-executed system transactions|small number of interactions)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = ```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ computer|home computer|DigitalHome elements)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ user|the player|a building block|users|Administrators)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ web server|the cloud|Software tools)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(log any defects|enhancement requests|change the configuration|track the submitted defect|stipulate which other users or groups can access cases|system wide configuration|a low level CMIB command line instruction|a project defined protocol|actions taken by users or Administrators|actions initiated automatically by the CCTNS system|a CCTV switching command|Source|Destination port|the player\'s choice|the selected S2S project)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(Target DMS|Message to be displayed|Beacons On/Off|configuring the building block of operation|actions|actions|the player\'s choice|the selected S2S project|Source|Destination port)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(CCTNS|Correlator|Tactical|Center-to-Center|Human-Computer|Backend Data Processing|Training Operations Mode)\s+System\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(secondary|input|browser|virtual|magnetic|hard|disk)\s+network\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user|users|patient|sun|old|mobile|players|services|joint|C4I|infrastructure)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk|interface|system|tools)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(easy|logical|coherent|timely|robust|multilingual|accessible|observable|fully)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(appropriate|individual|relevant|supplemental|broader|range|topics|materials)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(system|software)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[0] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(device)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[0] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(the|an|a)\s(old|patient|sun|house|room|space|instance|person)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[0] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(database|card|disk|file|system)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[0] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(to|for|in|with|such|that|be|have|allow|provide|ensure|make|set|allocate|store|send|receive|get|boot|run|boot|run|display|fetch|change|configure|use|fill|skim|visual|background|color|bandwidth|power|supply)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(profiles|groups|users|attributes|data|information|messages|rights|level|privileges|password|allocation|management|humidity|temperature|control|status|feedback|indicators|operations|configurations|modes|phases|mission|execution|instance|person|space|fractions|system)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("Only one person can use a single instance of the Space Fractions system."))

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, text)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, text)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, text)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, text)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z\s]+) to ([A-Za-z\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, text)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z\s]+) and ([A-Za-z\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, text)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([a-z]+ device|home devices|home computer|home wireless gateway device|sensor|controller devices|DigitalHome elements|master control device|hot-swapped hardware devices|the correlator CMIBs)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+ user|the general user|the home|a public network|the user|the patient|the sun|the old)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([a-z]+ interface|a web interface|a database|a magnetic stripe card|a tap|hard disk|an individual home web server|the C-2-C software system|the correlator Monitor and Control System network|the home web server)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(logging in and logging out|browsing web pages|submitting information and requests via a web interface|perform simple web operations|recovery from failure|hot-swapped hardware devices|send and receive communication|establish and maintain DigitalHome User Accounts|boot and run in a stand-alone configuration|easy to use and intuitive throughout|monitor and control home devices and systems|incident or lane closure information|establish an individual home web server hosted on a home computer)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(equipment requests|wireless communication|incident or lane closure information|bandwidth between the application and the user|CCTNS system)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("Because Flash movies do not have to be fully downloaded to play, the main system can be played within a few minutes with a regular modem connection to the Internet."))
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (server|website|system)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall (be able to|provide|establish|maintain|have|require|interface to|communicate with|connect with|use|get|send|receive|display|change|store|backup|transfer|distribute|monitor|control|interact with|establish and maintain|provide interaction with and control of) ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(2).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (images|data|information|plans|account|protocol|service|transfers|distribution|communication|control|interaction|backup|user account information|user plans)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b|\b\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdevice\b|\b\w+\sinterface\b|\b\w+\sscreen\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdatabase\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
